description: Powers of 3 in the odd Catalan numbers cat[2^n-1].
comments: Conjecture: all odd Catalan numbers have smallest factor 3, except cat[3] has smallest divisor 5 and cat[31] and cat[255] have smallest divisor 7 (checked up to cat[ -1+2^2048 ]).
mathematica: pow3[ nfac_ ] := (nfac - Plus @@ IntegerDigits[ nfac, 3 ])/(3-1) powcat3[ n_ ] := pow3[ 2n ]-pow3[ n+1 ]-pow3[ n ]; Table[ powcat3[ 2^n-1 ], {n, 2048} ]
author: _Wouter Meeussen_, Mar 28 2001
